Devotional.title: Aisi lagi lagan meera ho gayi magan
Devotional.song:

pd s' N Nd dp pm rgmD pmGrs

s 'nsG rG s 'n sG rG

s 'n sG rG s 'n sG rG

pd md dd dN s' Nd pp

mp pd ddd Ns' Nd

pd mdd d dN s' Ndp p

pd mdd ddN s' Nd pp
meera govind gopal gaane lagi

pp s' s' NN dd pm rmpD pmGrs
woh_to gali gali hari gun gaane lagi

s 'n sG rG s 'n sG rG
Aisi lagi lagan meera ho_gayi magan _ _ _

raana_ne vish_diya mano amrut piya

mp pdd ddd Ns' Nd pp

pd mdd ddN s' Nd pp
meera govind gopal gaane lagi

pp s' s' NN dd pm rmpD pmGrs
woh_to gali gali hari gun gaane lagi

s 'n sG rG s 'n sG rG

Devotional.title: Itni shakti hame dena data
Devotional.song:
Itni shakti hame denaa daataa,
M M G M M M – – G M – – M M G M – P —-

man kaa vishwaas kamzor ho naa
S S S P P P – – P d d d P M G P M – M – – –

hum chale nek raste pe humse
d d d d – – d – – d – d d P n d P M g r – – – 

bhoolkar bhi koi bhool ho naa
S – S g r r – – – – M g – g P M – – M – – –

Door agyaan ke ho andhere,
S’ – S’ S’ – r’ g’ r’ S’ n d P – d n S’ —-

too hume gyaan ki roshani de,
S’ – r’ n – – – – – r’ r’ – – g r’ S’ S’ —-

har buraaee se bachate rahe hum,
S’ S’ S’ S’ – r’ g’ r’ S’ n – – d P – d n n S’

jitni bhee de bhali zindagi de
S’ S’ R’ n – – – – S’ d – – P M M d P – – – d P M

Bair ho na kisi ka kisi se,
M M G M M M M M g M M M M M G M – P

Bhaawanaa man me badle ki ho na
S S S P P P – – – d d d P M g P M – M – – – –

Devotional.title: O Paalanhaare
Devotional.song:
o paalanhaare, nirgun aur nyaare
r g r p m r g r m g rs

tumre bin humra kauno.n naahee.n
s r sn. ss r g mg r gr s

humri uljhan, suljhaao bhagvan
r g rp m r g r mg rs

tumre bin humra kauno.n naahee.n
s r sn. ss r g mg r gr s

tumhaee humka ho sa.mbhaale
gr g m mm gr gm g grs

s g mm pd2pm grgm g grs

tumre bin humra kauno.n naahee.n
s r sn3.ss r g mg r gr s

cha.ndaa mein tumhaee to bhare ho chaa.ndanee
m g mp p d2 n S R n d p ndpm

sooraj mein ujaala tumhaee se
S nS np SnS np dp m p

e gagan, hai magan, tumhaee to deeye ho ee taare
g m pdnS nS RS n d2pd2pm m mp p p pdn d p m p

bhagavan, ye jeevan, tumhaee na sa.nwaaroge to kya koi sa.nwaare
g m pdnS nS RS n d2pd2pm m mp p p p p p n nd nddp dp pm mg r

(o paalanhaare…)

jo suno, to kahe.n, prabhuji humri hai binatee

g g gp m g gp m g g g p m g r g m

g gm gp m gm gp m g m md2 p mg r g

bhaktee ko shaktee do,
s r sn3. s r s

jag ke jo swaamee ho, itni to araj suno
p d pdnS nS R ndp m m p pdn S ndp
